channel.title: Video on I learnt about ...
channel.description: Recent content in Video on I learnt about ...

item.title: Dancing with hands
item.description: My daughter loves dancing. She was entranced by this (so was I). The effort this must have taken to choreograph and the level of control between both the dancers is impressive. Links Dancing with hands

item.title: Four minute mile
item.description: I had never seen the original footage of Sir Roger Bannister running the first four minute mile. His narration of the race really adds to it as well. Links First Four Minute Mile

item.title: How do crypto-currencies work?
item.description: A very simple introduction to how Bitcoin works … using a stuffed penguin! Links Bitcoin explained: How do crypto-currencies work?

item.title: Marble roll
Ma’agalim - Jane Bordeaux
item.description: This is a beautiful music video. Watch it all the way through and carefully watch what happens to some of the characters. Links Ma’agalim - Jane Bordeaux
